entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:04 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
